|serial = yes,, console,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = samsung |defaultpass = samsung |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2008 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Korea
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "CBU-4 EQ41-00084A PCS01E" is etched onto the bottom layer of the board. :Configuration would seem to be via the [https://www.maxlinear.com/products/interface/serial-transceivers/rs232 console port] only.
*The RAM on this device is on-board a removable SODIMM ''[[Samsung]]'' M470T6554GZ3-CE6, 512MB 2Rx16, PC2-5300S <!-- -555-12-A3 --> *The device's firmware is on-board a removable 1GB SD Card ''[[Samsung]]'' MM8GF01GWACA-NA
===PSU=== The power supply included with the unit <small>(at least in the US...)</small> would seem to be a '''BridgePower''' JPW129KA1200N01 (100-240VAC 50/60Hz, 1A -> 12VDC/2A) The device has a barrel w/ a reverse gender core (center pin on the adapter)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
